pkgmetadata.longdescription:
# pymacaron-asyncAn extension of pymacaron seamlessly adding asynchronous task executionbased on celery/Redis.See more at [pymacaron.com](http://pymacaron.com/async.html)NOTE: tests for pymacaron-async are located in pymacaron-helloworld. This is temporary and needs to be fixed.## AuthorErwan Lemonnier
[github.com/pymacaron](https://github.com/pymacaron)
[github.com/erwan-lemonnier](https://github.com/erwan-lemonnier)
[www.linkedin.com/in/erwan-lemonnier/](https://www.linkedin.com/in/erwan-lemonnier/)
